Hymn.Arabic: هذَا هُوَ الْيَوْمُ الَّذِي صَنَعُهُ الرَّبُّ، فَلنَتَهَلل وَنَفْرَحُ فِيهِ.
Hymn.English: 24 This is the day the Lord has made; We will rejoice and be glad in it.

Hymn.Arabic: يَا رَبُّ خَلِّصْنا يَا رَبُّ سَهِّلُ سُبُلَنَا.
Hymn.English: 25 Save now, I pray, O Lord; O Lord, I pray, send now prosperity.
27 God is the Lord, And He has given us light.
